Secure copy can be used to import or export content.

= Export a JCR node =

The following command will export the node {{code}}/gadgets{{/code}} in the repository {{code}}portal-system{{/code}}
of the portal container {{code}}portal{{/code}}:

{{screen}}
scp -P 2000 root@localhost:portal:portal-system:/gadgets .
{{/screen}}

The node will be exported as {{code}}gadgets.xml{{/code}}.

Note that the portal container name is used for GateIn. If you do ommit it, then the root container will be used.

= Import a JCR node =

The following command will reimport the node:

{{screen}}
scp -P 2000 gadgets.xml root@localhost:portal:portal-system/gadgets
{{/screen}}

The exported file format use the JCR system view. You can get more information about that in the JCR specification.
